education.description: Modules covered during course are Analysis and Design of Algorithms, Web Technologies, Advanced System Design, Internet and Cloud Computing.

As I was greatly involved in academics, I was able to procure immense knowledge on various courses like Object-Oriented Analysis and Design, Web Technology, Database Management System, System Programming and Operating Systems and Design and Analysis of Algorithms. The course programs placed an equal emphasis on theoretical and practical applications as well. Each course made me research and study further to match my curiosity in the respective areas, as well as the practical applications of my projects and concepts. These courses were just a preliminary step in my career and I had gone further to enhance myself.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: In the startup work environment, you get to have a relationship with your boss, the investors, and the key members of the team. Startups are like families - you see the good, the bad and the ugly, but in the end, you've got each other's back. Clay Clark's lines end in factual statements.Worked on client proposals, presentations, PoCs, Demos, Queries and provide solutions on cutting edge Development domain.Handled multiple frontend and backend projects for consulting firms and Upcelerators - cloud management services.Developed website for one of the most famous fertility and multispeciality hospitals in Asia - Sudha Hospital.Developed and delivered an Optical Character Recognition Mobile Application for the purpose of scanning at ease.Developed Mobile Application using the Ionic Framework.
